name: Aribeth de Tylmarande

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, Aribeth has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Aribeth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Regeneration
entries: Aribeth regains 20 hit points at the start of her turn. If Aribeth takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of Aribeth's next turn. Aribeth's body is destroyed only if she starts her turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

traits.name: Infernal Tracker
entries: Aribeth knows the distance to and direction of any creature that has broken a pact with Mephistopheles, even if the creature and Aribeth are on different planes of existence.

traits.name: Nightmare
entries: Aribeth is accompanied by a nightmare. The nightmare allows Aribeth to use it as a mount.

traits.name: Shadows
entries: 3 {@creature shadow||shadows} hide within the saddle of Aribeth's nightmare. These shadows only come out if there is a creature within 30 feet that is at 0 hit points. When that happens, 1 shadow will emerge and attack the creature in order to make it fail a death saving throw. It continues to do so until the creature is dead.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Aribeth makes three longsword attacks or three attacks with her sword called Void.

actions.name: Longsword
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) slashing damage or 8 (1d10 + 3 damage) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 9 (3d6 damage) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Void
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) slashing damage or 8 (1d10 + 3 damage) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 9 (3d6 damage) necrotic damage. A creature reduced to 0 hit points from damage dealt by the sword Void dies and can't be revived by any means short of a {@spell wish} spell.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Aribeth is a 11th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). Aribeth has the following paladin spells prepared:

immune: bludgeoning (from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered)
piercing (from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered)
slashing (from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered)
